attributes.comment:
This is outrageous that the government would consider raising these fees. Those
of us trying to adopt have spent thousands of dollars just to get to the point where
we file this paperwork. Many of us have had to renew our USCIS paperwork
because of slow-moving countries which requries us to incur added expsense with
new home studies, fingerprinting, etc. The renewal fee should be discounted, not
the full lug. Also, it is crazy that we have to pay to have fingerprints re-taken!!!
Why can't the government hand me a CD of my fingerprints for future use?? My
fingerprints are NOT GOING TO CHANGE!

I urge the federal government to reconsider this poor decision on raising fees.

Sincerely, Stefani J. Brancato

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Stefani J. Brancato
